MNAP.summary: MNP Petroleum Corporation explores for and develops oil and gas properties primarily in Central and East Asia. It owns exploration projects in Tajikistan and Mongolia; and has producing oilfields in Tajikistan. The company was formerly known as Manas Petroleum Corporation and changed its name to MNP Petroleum Corporation in January 2014. MNP Petroleum Corporation is based in Baar, Switzerland.

OCTX.summary: Octagon 88 Resources, Inc., a natural resource company, engages in acquiring, exploring, and developing natural resource assets. It holds an indirect interest in a contiguous land base of 73 sections comprising 46,720 acres of oil sands leases, as well as a direct working interest in petroleum and natural gas leases known as the Trout Lake properties in the Province of Alberta. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Steinhausen, Switzerland.

RIG.summary: Transocean Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides offshore contract drilling services for oil and gas wells worldwide. It contracts its drilling rigs, related equipment, and work crews to drill oil and gas wells. As of February 22, 2021, the company owned or had partial ownership interests in and operated a fleet of 37 mobile offshore drilling units, including 27 ultra-deepwater and 10 harsh environment floaters. It serves integrated oil companies, government-owned or government-controlled oil companies, and other independent oil companies. The company was founded in 1926 and is based in Steinhausen, Switzerland.
